price: 104. El fuego les quemará los rostros y sus bocas aparecerán desfiguradas.
arabic: تَلۡفَحُ وُجُوهَهُمُ ٱلنَّارُ وَهُمۡ فِيهَا كَٰلِحُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: talfaḥu wujūhahumu al-nāru wahum fīhā kāliḥūna
